channel.title: [317]delta based - i added slayer exp when slayer monster is dead doesnt work

item.title: [317]delta based - i added slayer exp when slayer monster is dead doesnt work
item.dc:creator: @bowzer bowzer
item.description:
@bowzer wrote:

i added so when you kill a certain monster in slayer tower and when hes dead you should get a certain amount of exp in slayer but it isnt giving me the exp. take a look at the code :

if (type == 1616) { if (playerLevel[18] < 10) { sM("You must be level 10 slayer or higher to attack this monster."); ResetAttackNPC(); addSkillXP(1000, 18); return false; } }
can any of you tell me when it isnt working and refix my code so it will work?

Read full topic
